content:
While you COULD find the URL to a topic (e.g. https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/375707-community/topic/hello.20I'm.20new.20here ) and paste it into message, did you know there's a cleaner way?

Try this, for example

  • type #com
  • type > to autocomplete
  • type hello
  • down arrow to select, then enter to get #community > hello I'm new here
